## Source: amazon-inspector (766e17e75d1b6492251c7c647d0783879b9fb18f0793046fc985e40a46295d63)
The package react-transition-group-legacy was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (991f62aeef5fff1cae1f52afb9892bd59606c11485854125d673511ef339e8b6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-transition-group-legacy' @ 100.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
